tool_description: Avoid long http requests by buffering requests and sending a callback when the result is complete.
name: Callbackfy
title: Callbackfy

api_list.name: Callback
api_list.description: Get a callback with the response of the requested call.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://callbackfy2.p.rapidapi.com/callback"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "callbackfy2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://callbackfy2.p.rapidapi.com/callback"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "callbackfy2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
